changes: The proposed plan is an excellent fit for the 'Space Optimized' style and matches the image layout. All furniture is correctly placed against the perimeter, leaving the central walkway clear.
Refined the description for 'nightstand_1' and 'nightstand_2' to be more precise ('at the head/foot of bed_1' instead of 'top/bottom side').

Refined the description for 'artwork_2' for better accuracy. The original stated it was 'above nightstand_2', but the image shows it mounted on the wall beside the nightstand, which is a more optimal placement.

refined_placements.chair_1: Placed at the dining table (table_1) against the left (west) wall.
refined_placements.chair_2: Placed at the dining table (table_1) against the left (west) wall, opposite chair_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Positioned against the right (east) wall, at the head of bed_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Positioned against the right (east) wall, at the foot of bed_1.
refined_placements.table_1: Set against the left (west) wall, between the kitchenette area and the sofa.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Placed against the left (west) wall, south of the dining table.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the left (west) wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the right (east) wall, beside nightstand_2 and the foot of the bed.
refined_placements.rug_1: Positioned on the floor against the bottom (south) wall, in front of the left window.
refined_placements.rug_2: Positioned on the floor against the bottom (south) wall, in front of the right window.
